titleStmt.title: A summarie of devotions compiled and used by Dr William Laud, sometime Ld Arch-bishop of Canterbvry now published according to the copy written with his own hand and reserved in the archives of St. John Baptist's Colledge Library in Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Laud, William, 1573-1645.

notesStmt.note: Includes text in English and Latin.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
